ModMetaData.name: Save Our Ship
ModMetaData.author: madmax3004, Mathus, ITR, Thain, Techpriest Antharann
ModMetaData.description:
Launched ships are saved to disk and can be landed on new worlds. Also allows building ships with interiors.
Based on Save Our Ship by Kentington, and forked from Save Our Ship (Reloaded) by pipakin.
